ComicInfo.Summary:
One week every year, the capital city of SHIDIMA is transformed into a celebration of costume, food, and drink for the Winter Equinox. But in Shidima, things are never quite what they seem. Behind the festive veil of the celebration, Aldaran sets into motion an intricate plan that has every organized group of able-bodied fighters converging on the capital on the same night. But as events unfold, the elaborate plot begins to unravel, and it's going to take nothing short of a miracle for our hero to salvage the situation, and prevent the mid-Autumn festival from becoming an all out bloodbath...
